source.query:
SELECT 
    sua.id,
    CASE
        WHEN sa.address1 IS NOT NULL AND sa.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN
            CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2, ', ')
        WHEN sa.address1 IS NOT NULL THEN
            CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ')
        WHEN sa.address2 IS NOT NULL THEN
            CONCAT(sa.address2, ', ')
        ELSE ''
    END AS formatted_address,
    COALESCE(sst_en.name, sst_ar.name) AS city,
    COALESCE(NULLIF(regexp_replace(sa.zipcode, '[^0-9]', '', 'g'), '')::INTEGER, NULL) AS postal_code,
    COALESCE(scon.name, 'Saudi Arabia') AS country,
    sua.created_at,
    sua.updated_at,
    COALESCE(sdt_en.name, sdt_ar.name) AS district,
    COALESCE(sa.latitude, 0) AS latitude,
    COALESCE(sa.longitude, 0) AS longitude,
    sua.default AS is_default,
    sua.user_id AS user_id,
    'other' AS type,
	case when sa.driver_meta_data is not null then sa.driver_meta_data->>'verified' 
	else 'false' END AS is_verified,
    sa.driver_meta_data->>'notes' AS comments
FROM
    spree_user_addresses sua
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses sa ON sua.address_id = sa.id
LEFT JOIN spree_countries scon ON sa.country_id = scon.id
LEFT JOIN spree_districts sdist ON sdist.id = sa.district_id
LEFT JOIN spree_district_translations sdt_en ON sdt_en.spree_district_id = sdist.id AND sdt_en.locale = 'en'
LEFT JOIN spree_district_translations sdt_ar ON sdt_ar.spree_district_id = sdist.id AND sdt_ar.locale = 'ar'
LEFT JOIN spree_state_translations sst_en  ON sst_en.id = sa.state_id AND sst_en.locale = 'en'
LEFT JOIN spree_state_translations sst_ar  ON sst_ar.id = sa.state_id AND sst_ar.locale = 'ar'
where (sa.id is not null and city is not null)
ORDER BY sua.id DESC;
select * from spree_cashbacks;

SELECT 
    a.id,
    a.user_id,
	COALESCE(a.name, '') AS name_on_card,
    COALESCE(a.cc_type, '') AS scheme,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.cc_type = 'MADA' THEN 'mada'
        ELSE ''
    END AS scheme_local,
	COALESCE(a.gateway_payment_profile_id, '') AS instrument_id,
	COALESCE(NULLIF(a.last_digits ~ E'^\\d+$', false)::integer, -1) AS last_digits,
	COALESCE(NULLIF(a.month ~ E'^\\d+$', false)::integer, -1) AS expiry_month,
	COALESCE(NULLIF(a.year ~ E'^\\d+$', false)::integer, -1) AS expiry_year,
    a.updated_at,
    a.created_at,
	'CREDIT' as card_type
FROM   
    spree_credit_cards a
where user_id is not null
ORDER BY 
    id ASC;

select distinct lower(sst.name) as name,
		 ss.country_id,
		 ss.created_at,
		ss.updated_at,
    	true AS is_visible,
    	ds.state_id
from danube_supermarkets ds 
join spree_states ss on ss.id = ds.state_id 
join spree_state_translations sst on sst.spree_state_id = ss.id and sst.locale = 'en';

SELECT ssm.id,
       ssmt.name,
       ssm.created_at,
       ssm.updated_at,
       ssm.deleted_at
FROM   spree_shipping_methods ssm
left join spree_shipping_method_translations ssmt
on ssm.id = ssmt.spree_shipping_method_id
and locale = 'en';

INSERT INTO PUBLIC.delivery_type
            (id,
             NAME,
             created_at)
VALUES      ( 1,
              'Regular',
              '2023-02-24 07:20:04.500904' ),
            ( 2,
              'Express',
              '2023-02-24 07:20:04.500904' ); 
SELECT 'AYM' as AYMInsertActivity

WITH delivery_instructions AS (
    SELECT 
        sli.line_item_id,
        CONCAT('Preferred Cut - ', COALESCE(spc.name, ''), '::', STRING_AGG(CONCAT(' ', COALESCE(scp.name_en, ''), ' ', round(sli.quantity/1000.0,2), ' ', 'kg'), ', '), STRING_AGG(CONCAT(' ',COALESCE(scp.name_ar, ''), ' ', round(sli.quantity/1000.0,2), ' ', 'kg'), ', ')
        ) AS delivery_instruction
    FROM spree_line_item_cut_patterns sli
    LEFT JOIN spree_cut_patterns scp ON scp.id = sli.cut_pattern_id 
    LEFT JOIN spree_preferred_cuts spc ON spc.id = scp.preferred_cut_id
    GROUP BY sli.line_item_id,spc.name
    ORDER BY sli.line_item_id
)

SELECT 
    a.id, 
    a.variant_id AS product_variant_id,
    COALESCE(siu.quantity_count, 0) as quantity,
    a.price,
    a.created_at,
    a.updated_at,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.on_sale=false THEN a.price
        ELSE '0.0'
    END as action_price,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.on_sale=true THEN a.price
        ELSE '0'
    END as sale_price,
    b.product_id,
    di.delivery_instruction,
    CASE
        WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'true' THEN 'replace-with-similar-product' 
        WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'false' THEN 'cancel'
        ELSE NULL
    END AS replacement_pref,
    e.quantity AS picked_quantity,
    null as picker_id,
    COALESCE(c.shipment_id, 0) as order_shipment_id,
    1 AS category_id, -- default value = 1 (grocery id from category table)
    '' as status
FROM spree_line_items a 
LEFT JOIN spree_variants b ON b.id = a.variant_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT ON (line_item_id) * FROM spree_inventory_units) c ON c.line_item_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT line_item_id, state , COUNT(id) as quantity_count
  FROM spree_inventory_units GROUP BY line_item_id, state) siu ON siu.line_item_id = a.id AND siu.state != 'canceled'
LEFT JOIN spree_orders d ON d.id = c.order_id
LEFT JOIN spree_picked_items e ON e.pickable_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN delivery_instructions di ON di.line_item_id = a.id
ORDER BY a.id DESC;

select 
	so.id as order_id,
	so.bill_address_id as address_id,
	'true' as is_bill_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.city,'') as city,
 	COALESCE(con.name,'') as country,
    sdtrans.name as district, 
	'other' as type,
	CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2) AS formatted_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.latitude,'0.0') as latitude,
 	COALESCE(sa.longitude,'0.0') as longitude,
	CASE 
        WHEN sa.zipcode ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(sa.zipcode AS INT)
        ELSE NULL
    END as postal_code,
	so.special_instructions as delivery_instruction,
	so.created_at,
	so.updated_at
from spree_orders so
left join spree_addresses sa on sa.id = so.bill_address_id
left join spree_countries con on con.id=sa.country_id
left join spree_districts dist on dist.id=sa.district_id 
left join spree_district_translations sdtrans on sdtrans.spree_district_id = dist.id and sdtrans.locale='en'
where so.state != 'cart'

UNION ALL

select 
	so.id as order_id,
	so.ship_address_id as address_id,
	'false' as is_bill_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.city,'') as city,
 	COALESCE(con.name,'') as country,
    sdtrans.name as district, 
	'other' as type,
	CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2) AS formatted_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.latitude,'0.0') as latitude,
 	COALESCE(sa.longitude,'0.0') as longitude,
	CASE 
        WHEN sa.zipcode ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(sa.zipcode AS INT)
        ELSE NULL
    END as postal_code,
	so.special_instructions as delivery_instruction,
	so.created_at,
	so.updated_at
from spree_orders so
left join spree_addresses sa on sa.id = so.ship_address_id
left join spree_countries con on con.id=sa.country_id
left join spree_districts dist on dist.id=sa.district_id
left join spree_district_translations sdtrans on sdtrans.spree_district_id = dist.id and sdtrans.locale='en'
where so.state != 'cart'

select sa.id,
	sa.order_id,
    sa.created_at,
    sa.updated_at,
    sa.source_id,
    sa.adjustable_id,
    sa.adjustment_reason_id as adjustable_reason_id,
    sa.amount,
    sa.promotion_code_id,
    sa.eligible,
    sa.included,
    sa.finalized,
    sa.free_sample,
    substring(sa.source_type,8) as source_type,
    sa.label,
    substring(sa.adjustable_type,8) as adjustable_type
from spree_adjustments sa
left join spree_orders so on sa.order_id = so.id and so.state !='cart'

WITH RankedResults AS (
    SELECT
        cancel_reason,
        created_at,
        updated_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cancel_reason ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS rn
    FROM spree_fulfilments
    WHERE cancel_reason IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id,
    cancel_reason AS reason_en,
    '' AS reason_ar,
    true AS visible,
    created_at,
    updated_at
FROM RankedResults
WHERE rn = 1
ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT
  ROW_NUMBER() OVER () as id,
  so.id as order_id,
  ss.id as shipment_id,
  so.created_at,
  so.currency,
  coalesce(so.payment_amount_received,0) as amount,
  so.auto_approved as approved,
  sp_max.v1_payment_id as transaction_id
FROM spree_orders so 
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
    SELECT sp.response_code as v1_payment_id
    FROM spree_payments sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_payment_methods spm ON spm.id = sp.payment_method_id
    WHERE sp.order_id = so.id
	 AND (
		 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spree_payments WHERE order_id = so.id) <= 1 OR
		spm.type NOT IN ('Spree::Gateway::LoyaltyPoint', 'Spree::PaymentMethod::StoreCredit')
	 )
    ORDER BY sp.created_at DESC 
    LIMIT 1
) sp_max ON true
LEFT JOIN spree_shipments ss on ss.order_id = so.id
where so.state != 'cart';

select 
sr.id,
sp.order_id,
case 
when sr.transaction_id is not null then sr.transaction_id 
else sp.response_code 
end as transaction_id,
sr.created_at,
sr.updated_at,
sr.amount,
case 
	when sr.status='uncertain' then 'pending'
	when sr.status='failed' then 'failed'
	when sr.status='success' then 'approved'
	else ''
End as status,
'SAR' as currency,
'' as type
From spree_refunds sr
inner join spree_payments sp on sp.id=sr.payment_id 
where sr.payment_id is not null;

SELECT
    a.id, 
    a.variant_id AS product_variant_id,
    COALESCE(SUM(siu.quantity_count), 0) AS quantity,
    a.price,
    a.created_at,
    a.updated_at,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.on_sale = false THEN a.price
        ELSE '0.0'
    END AS action_price,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.on_sale = true THEN a.price
        ELSE '0'
    END AS sale_price,
    b.product_id,
    CASE
      WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'true' THEN 'replace-with-similar-product' 
      WHEN d.replace_product::varchar = 'false' THEN 'cancel'
      ELSE NULL
    END AS replacement_pref,
    COALESCE(SUM(e.quantity), 0) AS picked_quantity,
    0 AS picker_id,
    COALESCE(c.shipment_id, 0) AS order_shipment_id,
    1 AS category_id, -- default value = 1 (grocery id from category table)
    '' AS status
FROM spree_line_items a 
LEFT JOIN spree_variants b ON b.id = a.variant_id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (line_item_id) * 
    FROM spree_inventory_units
) c ON c.line_item_id = a.id
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        line_item_id, 
        state, 
        COUNT(id) AS quantity_count
    FROM spree_inventory_units 
    GROUP BY line_item_id, state
) siu ON siu.line_item_id = a.id AND siu.state != 'canceled'
LEFT JOIN spree_orders d ON d.id = c.order_id
LEFT JOIN spree_picked_items e ON e.pickable_id = a.id
GROUP BY
    a.id, 
    a.variant_id,
    a.price,
    a.created_at,
    a.updated_at,
    a.on_sale,
    b.product_id,
    d.replace_product,
    COALESCE(c.shipment_id, 0)
ORDER BY a.id;

SELECT id,
       name,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
       deleted_at,
       CASE
            WHEN type = 'Spree::PaymentMethod::StoreCredit' THEN 'e-wlt'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::PayFort' THEN 'credit'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::CheckoutCom' THEN 'credit'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::Tamara' THEN 'tamara'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::BogusSimple' THEN 'bogus-simple'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::PaymentMethod::Check' THEN 'cod'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::CheckoutCom::ApplePay' THEN 'a-pay'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::LoyaltyPoint' THEN 'loy-pts'
            WHEN type = 'Spree::Gateway::PayFort::ApplePay' THEN 'a-pay'
        Else '' 
		End as code
FROM   spree_payment_methods
where name is not null
ORDER  BY id ASC;

SELECT ppv.id,
       ppv.created_at,
       ppv.item_id AS inventory_modifier_id,
       ppv.whodunnit AS user_id,
	   pim.product_id,
	   pim.rule_supermarket_id as supermarket_id,
       ppv.object_changes,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_price'->>0)::numeric AS action_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_price'->>1)::numeric AS updated_action_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_sale_price'->>0)::numeric AS sale_price,
       (ppv.object_changes->'action_sale_price'->>1)::numeric AS updated_sale_price,
       ppv.event
FROM spree_product_price_versions ppv
left join spree_product_inventory_modifiers pim
on pim.id = ppv.item_id
order by ppv.id;

select 
	id,
	user_id,
	category_id as store_credit_category_id,
	type_id as 	store_credit_type_id,
	created_by_id,
	amount,
	amount_used,
	amount_authorized,
	currency,
	LEFT(memo,200) as memo,
	invalidated_at,
	expires_at,
	created_at,
	updated_at,
	deleted_at
From spree_store_credits;

select
	id,
	name,
	available_to_admin,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_categories

select
	id,
	store_credit_id,
	action,
	amount,
	user_total_amount,
	authorization_code,
	update_reason_id,
	originator_type,
	originator_id,
	currency,
	COALESCE(created_at,current_timestamp) as created_at,
	COALESCE(updated_at,current_timestamp) as updated_at
From spree_store_credit_events;

select
	id,
	name,
	priority,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_types;

select
	id,
	name,
	created_at,
	updated_at
From spree_store_credit_update_reasons;

select
   ds.id,
   dst.name,
	concat(dst.address1,' ',dst.address2) as address,
    LEFT(COALESCE(REPLACE(REPLACE(ds.phone, '+966', ''), '+973', ''), ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
   ds.country_id,
   ds.created_at,
   ds.state_id,
   lower(dst.city) as city,
   ds.updated_at,
   ds.visible as is_visible,
   ds.latitude,
   ds.longitude,
   ds.time_slots_schedule_time_offset_override AS time_slots_lead_time,
   ds.express_fee AS express_delivery_fee,
   ds.call_masking as call_mask,
   ds.min_item_total_for_free_delivery as minimum_total_amount_for_free_delivery,
   COALESCE(dst.description, '') as description
from danube_supermarkets ds
left join danube_supermarket_translations dst on dst.danube_supermarket_id =ds.id and dst.locale='en'
order by ds.id;

SELECT
    id,
    supermarket_id,
    2 AS delivery_type_id,
    (
        SELECT
            ('[' || string_agg(format('[%s,%s]', coordinate->1, coordinate->0), ',') || ']')::json
        FROM (
            SELECT json_array_elements((ST_AsGeoJSON(coverage)::json->'coordinates')->0) AS coordinate
        ) AS flattened
    ) AS delivery_region,
    ST_X(ST_AsText(center)) AS center_longitude,
    ST_Y(ST_AsText(center)) AS center_latitude,
    '#DEE513' AS fill_color,
    0.5 AS fill_color_opacity,
    '#5704FC' AS border_color,
    2 AS border_width
FROM
    danube_express_supermarkets;

WITH collected_geometries AS (
    SELECT 
        szm.zone_id,
        ST_ASText(sd.region) AS geom,
	AVG(ST_X(sd.center::geometry)) AS center_longitude,
        AVG(ST_Y(sd.center::geometry)) AS center_latitude,
	ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by zone_id order by zone_id) as row_num
	
    FROM 
        spree_districts sd
    JOIN 
        spree_zone_members szm ON sd.id = szm.zoneable_id
    WHERE 
        sd.visible = true
    GROUP BY 
        szm.zone_id, sd.region
), filtered_geometries AS(
SELECT zone_id,geom,center_longitude,center_latitude
FROM collected_geometries
where row_num = 1)
SELECT 
    sz.id,
    coalesce(ds.id) AS supermarket_id,
    1 AS delivery_type_id,
    (
        SELECT 
            json_agg(coordinate) 
        FROM (
            SELECT 
                json_array_elements((ST_AsGeoJSON(ST_GeometryN(cg.geom,1))::json->'coordinates')->0) AS coordinate
        ) AS flattened
    ) AS delivery_region,
    cg.center_longitude,
    cg.center_latitude,
    '#DEE513' AS fill_color,
    0.5 AS fill_color_opacity,
    '#5704FC' AS border_color,
    2 AS border_width
FROM 
    spree_zones sz
LEFT JOIN 
    danube_supermarkets ds ON sz.id = ds.zone_id AND ds.supermarket_type IN ('regular', 'regular_express')
LEFT JOIN 
    filtered_geometries cg ON sz.id = cg.zone_id
where geom is not null
and ds.id is not null;

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY dtss.time_slot_id) AS id, 
    dtss.spree_shipping_method_id AS delivery_option_id, 
    CASE 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 0 THEN 'sunday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 1 THEN 'monday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 2 THEN 'tuesday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 3 THEN 'wednesday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 4 THEN 'thursday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 5 THEN 'friday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 6 THEN 'saturday' 
        ELSE '' 
    END AS day_of_week, 
    CAST(dts.start_time AS TEXT) AS start_time, 
    CAST(dts.end_time AS TEXT) AS end_time, 
    dts.enabled AS is_enabled, 
    1 AS country_id 
FROM 
    danube_time_slots_schedules dtss 
LEFT JOIN 
    danube_time_slots dts ON dtss.time_slot_id = dts.id 
GROUP BY 
    dtss.time_slot_id, 
    dtss.spree_shipping_method_id, 
    dtss.day_of_week, 
    dts.start_time, 
    dts.end_time, 
    dts.enabled;

SELECT
  id AS super_market_id,
  payment_id,
  delivery_option_id
FROM (
  SELECT
    id,
    UNNEST(REGEXP_MATCHES(
      REPLACE(
        REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(payment_options::text, '^.*home_delivery:(.*)$', '\1'), 'store_pick_up:.*$', ''), '\n', ''),
        '''(\d+)''',
        '\1'
      ),
      '(\d+)',
      'g'
    ))::INTEGER AS payment_id,
    '1' AS delivery_option_id -- Home Delivery type id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%home_delivery%'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    id AS super_market_id,
    UNNEST(REGEXP_MATCHES(
      REPLACE(
        REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(REGEXP_REPLACE(payment_options::text, '^.*store_pick_up:(.*)$', '\1'), 'home_delivery:.*$', ''), '\n', ''),
        '''(\d+)''',
        '\1'
      ),
      '(\d+)',
      'g'
    ))::INTEGER AS payment_id,
    '2' AS delivery_option_id -- Store Pickup Delivery type id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%store_pick_up%'
) AS subquery_alias
ORDER BY super_market_id;

SELECT
  id AS supermarket_id, 
  2 AS delivery_option_id
FROM danube_supermarkets
WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%store_pick_up%'

UNION

SELECT
  id,
  1 AS delivery_option_id
FROM danube_supermarkets
WHERE payment_options::text LIKE '%home_delivery%';

select * from (SELECT 
      id AS supermarket_id,
      1 AS delivery_type_id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE supermarket_type IN ('regular', 'regular_and_express')
  UNION
  SELECT 
      id AS supermarket_id,
      2 AS delivery_type_id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE supermarket_type IN ('express', 'regular_and_express')) as ds order by supermarket_id asc;

select 
sfdrw.id,
sur.first_name,
sur.last_name,
sur.email,
sur.mobile_number_country_code as country_code,
sur.mobile_phone_number as mobile_number,
sfdrw.comment as message,
sfdrw.created_at,
sfdrw.updated_at,
sfdrw.user_id
from spree_feedback_reviews sfdrw
Left join spree_users sur on sur.id = sfdrw.user_id;

Select
  id,
  user_id,
  tenant_id,
  loyalty_member_id,
  loyalty_id,
  created_at,
  updated_at
from spree_loyalty_members;
